servinfo.title: A/C Compressor Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment
servinfo.ptxt: For M16 engine model referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment (M16A Engine Model) .
For J20 engine model referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt On-Vehicle Inspection (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
For F9Q engine model referring to Accessory Drive Belt Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model .
